00030 #ifndef ORBITALS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00031 #define ORBITALS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00032 
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <map>
00035 
00036 namespace SimSite3D{
00037 
00039   typedef enum orbit_enum{
00040     UNKNOWN_ORBIT  =  0,
00041     SP1,       
00042     SP2,       
00043     SP3,       
00044     SP4,       
00045     AMIDE,     
00046     AMBIG,     
00047     CO2,
00048     CAT,
00049     PL3,
00050     AR,         
00051     O_ORBITAL,
00052     O2,
00053     DEFAULT_ORBIT,   
00054     ORBIT_ENUM_END   
00055   }orbit_type;
00056 
00060   class orbit_defs{
00061   public:
00063     orbit_defs();
00064 
00065     ~orbit_defs() { ; }
00066 
00067     orbit_type 
00068     operator[](std::string s_in)
00069     { 
00070       std::map<std::string, orbit_type>::const_iterator pos;
00071       pos = str_to_orbital.find(s_in);
00072       return (pos == str_to_orbital.end() ? UNKNOWN_ORBIT : pos->second);
00073     }
00074 
00075     std::string 
00076     operator[](orbit_type orb)
00077     { 
00078       std::map<orbit_type, std::string>::const_iterator pos;
00079       pos = orbital_to_str.find(orb);
00080       return (pos == orbital_to_str.end() ? ".err" : pos->second);
00081     }
00082 
00083   private:
00084     std::map<std::string, orbit_type> str_to_orbital;  
00085     std::map<orbit_type, std::string> orbital_to_str;
00086   };
00087 
00088 }
00089 #endif
